contentrichtext.text: '''Marlowe''' may refer to: * [[Marlowe (name)]] ==Places== * [[Marlowe Theatre]], in Canterbury, England * [[Marlowe, West Virginia]] ** [[Marlowe Consolidated School]], listed on the U.S. National Register of Historic Places * Marlowes, a major street in the town of [[Hemel Hempstead]] in Hertfordshire, England == Performing arts == * [[Marlowe (musical)|''Marlowe'' (musical)]], loosely based on the life of Christopher Marlowe * [[Marlowe (film)|''Marlowe'' (film)]], a 1969 drama based on a story by Raymond Chandler * [[Marlowe Brothers]], stage name of pianists Jeffrey and Ronald Marlowe * ''[[Where's Marlowe?]]'', 1998 comedy/mystery film * ''[[Philip Marlowe, Private Eye]]'', television mystery series airing from 1983-86 == See also == * [[Marlow (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
